attributes.action: Establish a concessionary travel Passport for the elderly and disabled!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The need for equality in the current concessionary travel scheme as not been correctly run, being unfair and not taking in the full independence of users and the needs, it should be nationally controlled and opened to assist all the elderly and disabled to equal and fair usage which is part of equality undder human rights, the creating of a full british concessionary travel passport is needed to include all inland travel on buss's, trains and domestic air travel, no difference as per some local authorities, and  stricter criteria for those whom apply under disability to be either mobility impairment or developmental inpairment no other excuses, must cover travel within England, Wales and Scotland under full concession and other services at discount.
